overview: Welcome to the Fantasy Casino, where the country's most handsome, sexy, centerfolds bet their clothes for cash. Watch these buff, muscular idols wager their shirts, pants and underwear on craps, roulette and black jack. Each time they lose, they're wearing less! And after every stitch is gone they keep playing by spinning a wheel of punishment that sends them on a fiendish cycle of naked endurance tests. Will Lady Luck deal them a naked paddling, body paint or send them to the dungeon? Between games, each guy puts on a private, naked show just for you. In this casino, the more they lose... the more you win.
title: 7 Card Studs
